text: 19.12: Ru 23.2; FG 17.7Pairat mba kameŋ mbararagiap, ana Zisas fhɨrgirim, ana ŋgɨrga tuavi ndi gari. Mbe Zudaiŋ, mbe kaav khaŋ nzuai, “Ndu mba guma fhɨrgirim, ana ŋgɨgɨrga, ndu Romin guman pan Sisar kɨvntok fhuvara. Mba nduara khaŋ wo nzuai guma. ‘Gu ŋgui vhɨrve gari guman pan ma,’ ana Sisar pana guma ma.”
